body_html: @azemZejnil Yeah, I think it's impossible to change the input type in the training, I think it depends on what tensorflow model you are using for training your model, it seems complicated. Or I do not know, maybe there is a way of customisation of the input, but I have never done it, yet :). You are welcome.

body: @azemZejnil Yeah, I think it's impossible to change the input type in the training, I think it depends on what tensorflow model you are using for training your model, it seems complicated. Or I do not know, maybe there is a way of customisation of the input, but I have never done it, yet :). You are welcome.
